title: Lola
body:
<<if visited("Lola")is false>>
Detective: Hello Miss. 
Lady: Hello.
Detective: I am Officer Awesomesauce. I'm investigating the murder.
Lady: Oh, I see. I'm Lola, I do the cleaning around here
<<else>>
Detective: Hello again, Lola.
Lola: Hello Detective.
<<endif>>
<<if not visited("Lola.EveningBrief")>>
[[What can you tell me about the evening?|Lola.EveningBrief]]
<<endif>>
<<if visited ("Lola.EveningBrief")>>
[[When you found the body, what time was it?|Lola.DetailTime]]<<not visited ("Lola.DetailTime")>>
[[Did you see anyone leave the apartment?|Lola.SeeAnyone]]<<not visited ("Lola.SeeAnyone")>>
[[You said you heard an argument. Can you tell me any details? |Lola.ArguingDetail]]<<not visited ("Lola.ArgumentDetail")>>
<<endif>>
[[Detective: Wait here please. I may have more questions.|Lola.Goodbye]]

title: Lola.DetailTime
body:
It was at around 6:50.
[[Did you see anyone leave the apartment?|Lola.SeeAnyone]]<<not visited ("Lola.SeeAnyone")>>
[[You said you heard an argument. Can you tell me any details? |Lola.ArguingDetail]]<<not visited ("Lola.ArgumentDetail")>>
[[Detective: Wait here please. I may have more questions.|Lola.Goodbye]]

title: Lola.EveningBrief
body:
Lola: I was cleaning the hallways like I always do.
Lola: When I went past Mr Wright's apartment, I heard some raised voices.
Lola: I came past later on, and the door was ajar...
Lola: So I poked my head in to see if everything was alright
Lola: and I saw Mr Wright's body on the floor!
Lola: So I ran downstairs to tell Kyle to ring the police.
[[When you found the body, what time was it?|Lola.DetailTime]]<<not visited ("Lola.DetailTime")>>
[[Did you see anyone leave the apartment?|Lola.SeeAnyone]]<<not visited ("Lola.SeeAnyone")>>
[[You said you heard an argument. Can you tell me any details? |Lola.ArguingDetail]]<<not visited ("Lola.ArgumentDetail")>>
[[Detective: Wait here please. I may have more questions.|Lola.Goodbye]]

title: Lola.SeeAnyone
body:
No, I didn't see anyone leave the aparment. Sorry.
[[When you found the body, what time was it?|Lola.DetailTime]]<<not visited ("Lola.DetailTime")>>
[[You said you heard an argument. Can you tell me any details? |Lola.ArguingDetail]]<<not visited ("Lola.ArgumentDetail")>>
[[Detective: Wait here please. I may have more questions.|Lola.Goodbye]]

title: Lola.ArguingDetail
body:
I heard raised voices when I went past at about 6:35.
[[Did you hear what they were arguing about? |Lola.ArguingDetail2]]<<not visited ("Lola.ArguingDetail2")>>
[[Do you know who Mr Wright was arguing with? |Lola.ArguingMaybeFriend]]<<not visited ("Lola.ArguingMaybeFriend")>>
[[When you found the body, what time was it?|Lola.DetailTime]]<<not visited ("Lola.DetailTime")>>
[[Did you see anyone leave the apartment?|Lola.SeeAnyone]]<<not visited ("Lola.SeeAnyone")>>
[[You said you heard an argument. Can you tell me any details? |Lola.ArguingDetail]]<<not visited ("Lola.ArgumentDetail")>>
